camel.source.endpoint.cacheConfiguration.name: camel.source.endpoint.cacheConfigurationProperties
camel.source.endpoint.cacheConfiguration.description: The Properties for the javax.cache.spi.CachingProvider to create the CacheManager

camel.source.endpoint.cachingProvider.name: camel.source.endpoint.cachingProvider
camel.source.endpoint.cachingProvider.description: The fully qualified class name of the javax.cache.spi.CachingProvider

camel.source.endpoint.configurationUri.name: camel.source.endpoint.configurationUri
camel.source.endpoint.configurationUri.description: An implementation specific URI for the CacheManager

camel.source.endpoint.readThrough.name: camel.source.endpoint.readThrough
camel.source.endpoint.readThrough.description: If read-through caching should be used

camel.source.endpoint.storeByValue.name: camel.source.endpoint.storeByValue
camel.source.endpoint.storeByValue.description: If cache should use store-by-value or store-by-reference semantics

camel.source.endpoint.writeThrough.name: camel.source.endpoint.writeThrough
camel.source.endpoint.writeThrough.description: If write-through caching should be used

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.filteredEvents.name: camel.source.endpoint.filteredEvents
camel.source.endpoint.filteredEvents.description: Events a consumer should filter (multiple events can be separated by comma). If using filteredEvents option, then eventFilters one will be ignored One of: [CREATED] [UPDATED] [REMOVED] [EXPIRED]

camel.source.endpoint.oldValueRequired.name: camel.source.endpoint.oldValueRequired
camel.source.endpoint.oldValueRequired.description: if the old value is required for events

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: if the event listener should block the thread causing the event

camel.source.endpoint.eventFilters.name: camel.source.endpoint.eventFilters
camel.source.endpoint.eventFilters.description: The CacheEntryEventFilter. If using eventFilters option, then filteredEvents one will be ignored

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.createCacheIfNotEx.name: camel.source.endpoint.createCacheIfNotExists
camel.source.endpoint.createCacheIfNotEx.description: Configure if a cache need to be created if it does exist or can't be pre-configured.

camel.source.endpoint.lookupProviders.name: camel.source.endpoint.lookupProviders
camel.source.endpoint.lookupProviders.description: Configure if a camel-cache should try to find implementations of jcache api in runtimes like OSGi.

camel.component.jcache.cacheConfiguratio.name: camel.component.jcache.cacheConfigurationPropertiesRef
camel.component.jcache.cacheConfiguratio.description: References to an existing Properties or Map to lookup in the registry to use for configuring jcache.

camel.component.jcache.cachingProvider.name: camel.component.jcache.cachingProvider
camel.component.jcache.cachingProvider.description: The fully qualified class name of the javax.cache.spi.CachingProvider

camel.component.jcache.configurationUri.name: camel.component.jcache.configurationUri
camel.component.jcache.configurationUri.description: An implementation specific URI for the CacheManager

camel.component.jcache.bridgeErrorHandle.name: camel.component.jcache.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.jcache.bridgeErrorHandle.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.jcache.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.jcache.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.jcache.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.
